FuncDef: The display cpu-usage monitor command is used to show the overload information of the CPU usage. The display cpu-usage monitor command is used to show the overload information of the CPU usage.
CLIs: display cpu-usage monitor { slot <slotID> [ cpu <cpuID> ] | all }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specify the CPU ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Display the CPU overload information on all boards.
-
